original_text: Jehoshaphat bowed down with his face to the ground, and all the people of Judah and Jerusalem fell down in worship before the Lord.
korean_text: 여호사밧이 몸을 굽혀 얼굴을 땅에 대니 온 유다와 예루살렘 주민들도 여호와 앞에 엎드려 여호와께 경배하고

sentences.original_text: Jehoshaphat bowed down with his face to the ground
and all the people of Judah and Jerusalem
fell down in worship before the Lord
